
{{Server function}}
This function destroys a text display and will unlink all the [[/textitem.md|textitem]]s on it. This does not stop the textitems existing, but anyone who was observing the textitems through this display will stop seeing them.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool textDestroyDisplay ( textdisplay display )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
* '''display:''' This is the [[/textdisplay.md|textdisplay]] that you wish to have destroyed.

==Example==
This example creates a display then destroys it again straight away.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
myDisplay = textCreateDisplay ()
textDestroyDisplay ( myDisplay )
</syntaxhighlight>
